initialMessage.subject: Cracow League, S{season}
body: Greetings!
Here are your houses for the Cracow League, Season {season} in the format house -> game:
Stark: {stark}
Greyjoy: {greyjoy}
Lannister: {lannister}
Tyrell: {tyrell}
Martell: {martell}
Baratheon: {baratheon}
You can create all your games (if not exists yet - double check before and after the creation - abort if you created a duplicate!) with default settings and following changes:
PLAY MODE: PBEM + Start by anybody allowed
GAME TITLE: Cracow League S{season}/G{stark} (or another appropriate game number)
PICKING HOUSES: FREE CHOICE
GAME TYPE: PROFESSIONAL
GAME PASSWORD: {password}
CUSTOM - Faceless Game: ENABLED
The password for your other games to join will also be ‚‚{password}‘‘.
You can use the filter in the open games to search for the other games as there are quite a lot, just search for ,,Cracow League‘‘ and you'll get the list of already created games.
If there are any problems, please contact {contact} on Discord or Thronemaster and I'll help you with your questions!
Most important rules:
- Games are both SILENT and FACELESS! Don't use the chat for messages.

- DELAY your last march if it is the last march of a game. It is important that all games end at the same time so houses are not revealed early. If you have the last march of a game, write "delay!" on the open chat and wait 12-14 days before you resolve it. Also, if you are the defender in the last battle, delay your card selection and your retreat until 12-14 days after the last action passed.
- Consider the board carefully before making moves, don't commit KM.
You can find all rules including scoring and penalties here: https://www.thronemaster.net/?goto=community&sub=forum&fid=15&tid=87066
Good luck in the tournament and best regards from
{judgeName}
Again and to reinforce the previous statement: The faceless and silent aspects of the games are our top priorities.
